item.title: Trump threatens Fed chair Powell with 'major lawsuit' over HQ renovation cost
item.description: President Trump is escalating his efforts to pressure Fed Chair Jerome Powell to lower interest rates.

item.title: Trump's tax law will mostly benefit the rich, while leaving poorer Americans with less, CBO says
item.description: The CBO estimates that the 10% of poorest Americans will lose roughly $1,200 a year, while the richest 10% will see their income increase by $13,600.

item.title: Judge rejects unsealing Ghislaine Maxwell grand jury transcripts
item.description: The Trump administration has faced criticism for reneging on promises to release investigative files about Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

item.title: Trump extends China tariff deadline by 90 days
item.description: President Donald Trump has signed an executive order that will prevent U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods from spiking for another 90 days.

item.title: Putin wants a photo op with Trump and a sanctions delay, says EU foreign policy chief
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin and his U.S. counterpart Donald Trump are set to meet this week to discuss the war in Ukraine.
